reviewText: It was a good anime. But I wish the maine girl character would have had more emotion to her. So that's why I give it 3 stars.
I'm kinda not a fan of love stories but this one it's actually pretty cool and I found myself watching the whole thing I've seen better fight scenes but it was funny so it easily made up for it
Over all, I would say this series was very good. Granted, I haven't finished watching it yet, but so far, well worth the buy. I would recommend it.

its a tender and sweet show.
likable characters, well produced, but sorta for a age group between 12-16 boy or girl.
its not childish, or soooo geared for children, but its not very adult for anime either.
I love this anime. It is by far my favorite anime of all time. A must see if you like romance anime.
